sentence_en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentence_zh: 后代体内含有父母亲基因图谱的混合。

sentence_en: He doesn't scare easily.
sentence_zh: 他不轻易害怕。

definition: vt. 装入胶囊，简缩;adj. 精简的
sentence_en: You are asked to swallow a capsule containing vitamin B.
sentence_zh: 你被要求吞下一颗含维生素B的胶囊。

definition: vi. 坚守于，对...忠贞; vt. 使附着
sentence_en: One must be duly self-disciplined to adhere to it.
sentence_zh: 人要适当自律才能坚持它。

sentence_en: The paramedics couldn't revive her.
sentence_zh: 护理人员无法使她苏醒。

sentence_en: Literature can enrich your spiritual life.
sentence_zh: 文学可以丰富你的精神生活。

definition: adj. 反常的;n. 不正常的人
sentence_en: They thought his behaviour was abnormal.
sentence_zh: 他们认为他行为反常。

sentence_en: A violent shiver convulsed him.
sentence_zh: 剧烈的颤抖使他抽搐不已。

definition: vt. 识别，使差异;vi. 区别
sentence_en: I can't differentiate one variety from another.
sentence_zh: 我无法将这几个品种区别开来。

definition: n. 垄断，专利，独占，控制
sentence_en: Had he succeeded, he would have acquired a monopoly.
sentence_zh: 如果他那时成功了，他就会获得垄断地位。

sentence_en: Toolbelts free both hands and lessen the risk of dropping hammers.
sentence_zh: 工具带解放了双手，并减少了锤子掉落的危险。

definition: adj. 交替的，轮流的;v. 交替
sentence_en: Dark stripes alternate with pale ones.
sentence_zh: 深浅条纹相间。

definition: v. 发泄，表达;n. 排气口，表达
sentence_en: She gave vent to her anger and jealousy.
sentence_zh: 她发泄了自己的怒意和嫉妒。

sentence_en: The two pictures are similar, although not identical.
sentence_zh: 这两幅画很相似，虽然不完全相同。

sentence_en: The plan was approved without qualification.
sentence_zh: 这项计划获得无条件批准。

sentence_en: Radioactive water had seeped into underground reservoirs.
sentence_zh: 放射性水已渗入了地下蓄水池。

definition: adj. 似真实合理的，似可信的
sentence_en: She was a plausible liar.
sentence_zh: 她是个巧言令色的说谎高手。

sentence_en: There's not much bounce left in these balls.
sentence_zh: 这些球已没有多少弹性了。

definition: n. (度假)胜地，手段;vi. 诉诸，常去
sentence_en: The resort is geared towards children.
sentence_zh: 这个旅游胜地适合儿童玩耍。

definition: n. 远景，看法;adj. 透视的
sentence_en: In his art he broke the laws of scientific linear perspective.
sentence_zh: 他在自己的绘画艺术中打破了科学的直线透视法规律。

definition: n. 意外的相见;v. 遇到，偶然碰到
sentence_en: Did you encounter anyone in the building?
sentence_zh: 你在那栋大楼里偶然遇到什么人了吗？

definition: n. 垃圾，杂乱;v. 乱丢垃圾，弄乱
sentence_en: Animals reject the runt of the litter.
sentence_zh: 动物们排斥一窝中最弱小的幼仔。

definition: vt. 加速，提前;vi. 加速
sentence_en: Inflation continues to accelerate.
sentence_zh: 通货膨胀不断加速。

definition: vt. 冲淡，稀释;adj. 冲淡的，稀释的
sentence_en: There was a clear intention to dilute black voting power.
sentence_zh: 削弱黑人选举权的意图是显而易见的。

definition: n. 恐怖，惊骇，令人惧怕或讨厌的人或事物
sentence_en: Her eyes were wild with terror.
sentence_zh: 她的眼睛里充满了恐惧。

sentence_en: The planes landed on adjacent runways.
sentence_zh: 这些飞机在毗连的跑道上降落。

definition: vt. 加强;vi. 得到加强
sentence_en: I hope this will reinforce Indonesian determination to deal with this kind of threat.
sentence_zh: 我希望这会加强印度尼西亚对付这类威胁的决心。

definition: n. 迁移，移动;v. 调转，调任
sentence_en: The novel does not transfer well to the movies.
sentence_zh: 这部小说不太适宜改编成电影。

sentence_en: Her voice was full of anxiety.
sentence_zh: 她的声音饱含焦虑。

definition: n. 优势，有利条件;vt. 有利于
sentence_en: His height gives him a clear advantage.
sentence_zh: 他的身高使他具有明显的优势。

sentence_en: Energy consumption rises as countries industrialize.
sentence_zh: 能源消耗随着各国工业化而增加。

sentence_en: I think what screen dance will do, though, is heighten awareness of dance in general.
sentence_zh: 我认为荧屏舞蹈会在总体上提高人们对舞蹈的认知。

definition: adj. 精确的，准确的，严格的
sentence_en: She gave me clear and precise directions.
sentence_zh: 她给了我清晰而准确的指示。

sentence_en: This formula is used to calculate the area of a circle.
sentence_zh: 这个公式用于计算圆的面积。

sentence_en: This thesis does not stand up to close inspection.
sentence_zh: 这个论点经不起仔细推敲。

sentence_en: Huxley speculated that a coat of hair would insulate against loss of body heat and might streamline the body to reduce drag in flight.
sentence_zh: 赫胥黎推测，一层毛发可以隔离身体热量的流失，并可能使身体呈现流线型，以减少飞行中的阻力。

sentence_en: Jane is very mature for her age.
sentence_zh: 简年龄不大，却很成熟。

sentence_en: The main drawback to it is the cost.
sentence_zh: 它的主要缺点是成本高。

sentence_en: I enjoy the occasional glass of wine.
sentence_zh: 我喜欢偶尔喝一杯葡萄酒。

sentence_en: The company has a virtual monopoly in this area of trade.
sentence_zh: 这家公司实质上已经垄断了这种贸易。

sentence_en: Does this spell the doom of the physical book?
sentence_zh: 这是否意味着实体书的末日？

definition: adj. 破产的，贫穷的;n. 破产者
sentence_en: They went bankrupt in 1993.
sentence_zh: 他们于1993年破产。

sentence_en: It's amazing how soon you adapt.
sentence_zh: 你这么快就适应了，真是令人惊奇。

sentence_en: Very small toys can choke a baby.
sentence_zh: 很小的玩具可使婴儿窒息。

definition: adj. 构成整体所必需的，完整的
sentence_en: As an integral part of learning, it brings about positive changes, making people develop and grow.
sentence_zh: 作为学习的一个组成部分，它带来了积极的变化，使人发展和成长。

sentence_en: His greatest innovation was the use of interchangeable parts.
sentence_zh: 他最伟大的创新是使用了可互换部件。

sentence_en: We have a duty to uphold the law.
sentence_zh: 维护法律是我们的责任。

sentence_en: The area was struck by an outbreak of cholera.
sentence_zh: 那一地区爆发了霍乱。

sentence_en: The contents of the package may have settled in transit.
sentence_zh: 包裹里的东西可能在运输途中摇密实了。

sentence_en: His treatment was a combination of surgery, radiation and drugs.
sentence_zh: 对他的治疗是把手术、放射和药物治疗结合为一体。

sentence_en: European farmers are planning a massive demonstration against farm subsidy cuts.
sentence_zh: 欧洲的农场主们正在策划一场反对削减农场补贴的大游行。

definition: n. 妥协，折衷;vt. 妥协处理
sentence_en: I refuse to compromise my principles.
sentence_zh: 我拒绝在原则问题上妥协。

sentence_en: How much memory does the program occupy?
sentence_zh: 这个程序占用多少内存？

definition: n. 破裂，断裂;v. 使破裂
sentence_en: I nearly gave myself a rupture lifting that pile of books.
sentence_zh: 提那一大堆书差点儿让我得了疝气。

sentence_en: If you're still skeptical about exercising, we can only ask you to trust us and give it a try.
sentence_zh: 如果你仍对锻炼持怀疑态度，我们只能请你相信我们，试一试。

sentence_en: He was tall, lean and handsome.
sentence_zh: 他长得瘦高而英俊。

definition: adj. 偶然的，随便的，非正式
sentence_en: The boy was cheeky and casual.
sentence_zh: 这个男孩嘻皮笑脸、随随便便。

definition: n. 接近; 途径;v. 靠近，接近
sentence_en: There's a certain novelty value in this approach.
sentence_zh: 这种方法有一定的新意。

definition: adj. 纪念的;n. 纪念碑(堂),
sentence_en: The town raised a memorial to those killed in the war.
sentence_zh: 这座小镇为战争中牺牲的人树立了一座纪念碑。

sentence_en: Bill was stimulated by the challenge.
sentence_zh: 比尔受到该挑战的激励。

sentence_en: Fans of electric cars say they are clean, quiet, and economical.
sentence_zh: 电动车爱好者说电动车无污染，无噪音，而且经济。

sentence_en: There are two main problems which afflict people with hearing impairments.
sentence_zh: 有两大问题困扰有听觉障碍的人。

definition: n. 常到的地方;vi. 徘徊
sentence_en: That decision came back to haunt him.
sentence_zh: 那个决定对他造成无法摆脱的困扰。

definition: n. 下水道;v. 耗尽，排出
sentence_en: The main drain was blocked.
sentence_zh: 主下水道被堵住了。

sentence_en: He's ignorant about modern technology.
sentence_zh: 他对现代科技一无所知。

sentence_en: Japan's prime minister-designate is completing his cabinet today.
sentence_zh: 日本即将上任的首相今天将完成他的内阁组建。

sentence_en: The doctor said James had now developed a heart murmur.
sentence_zh: 医生说詹姆斯心脏现在出现了杂音。

sentence_en: A number of neurotransmitters exert their effects by first increasing cyclic AMP concentrations in target neurons.
sentence_zh: 许多神经递质首先通过增加靶神经元中的循环 AMP 浓度来发挥其作用。

definition: n. 想像力，幻想;adj. 想像的
sentence_en: So you fancy yourself as the boss someday?
sentence_zh: 那么你认为自己有一天会成老板？

sentence_en: Thornburgh said such demands wouldn't violate the First Amendment.
sentence_zh: 桑伯说这样的要求不违反第一修正案。

definition: adj. 无目的的，无聊的;vt. 虚度; 使空闲
sentence_en: Now the machine is lying idle.
sentence_zh: 现在这台机器正处于闲置状态。

sentence_en: They should donate at the registration point.
sentence_zh: 他们应该在注册登记处捐款。

sentence_en: The local kids hang out at the mall.
sentence_zh: 当地的孩子常在商场闲荡。

definition: vt. 战胜，克服;vi. 获胜，赢
sentence_en: They had to overcome formidable obstacles.
sentence_zh: 他们得克服重重障碍。

definition: vi. 大幅度削减;vt. 猛砍
sentence_en: The mayor will have to slash the city's already bare-bones budget.
sentence_zh: 市长将不得不削减该市已经降到最低限度的预算。

sentence_en: As the forerunner, "United 93" will take most of the heat, whether it deserves it or not.
sentence_zh: 作为先驱，无论是否值得，“93号曼联”都将承受大部分的压力。

definition: adj. 稳定的;n. 马厩，马棚
sentence_en: Mentally, she is not very stable.
sentence_zh: 她的心理状态不十分稳定。

definition: n. 药物，治疗法;vt. 治疗
sentence_en: There is no simple remedy for unemployment.
sentence_zh: 失业问题没有简单的解决办法。

sentence_en: He did not foresee any problems.
sentence_zh: 他没有预见到任何问题。

definition: adj. 有毒的;n. 有毒物质
sentence_en: Many pesticides are highly toxic.
sentence_zh: 许多杀虫剂毒性很大。

sentence_en: They'll be able to furnish you with the rest of the details.
sentence_zh: 他们将能够给你提供其余的细节。

definition: n. 尊敬;vt. 认为，尊敬
sentence_en: You need to build your self-esteem.
sentence_zh: 你需要树立自尊心。

sentence_en: Altman strips away the pretense and mythology to expose the film industry as a business like any other.
sentence_zh: 奥尔特曼揭穿伪装和神话，把电影业暴露成像其他任何行业一样。

sentence_en: Why are you so bright and cheerful today?
sentence_zh: 你今天怎么这么高兴？

sentence_en: Furthermore, they claim that any such interference is completely ineffective.
sentence_zh: 此外，他们声称任何此类干涉都是完全无效的。

sentence_en: She was a very vigorous sort of person.
sentence_zh: 她是那种精力非常旺盛的人。

definition: n. 蜜饯，果酱;vt. 保存
sentence_en: People should insulate their homes to conserve energy.
sentence_zh: 人们应该使住房隔冷以保存能量。

sentence_en: He gave me very explicit directions on how to get there.
sentence_zh: 他清楚地向我说明了去那儿的路线。

definition: vt. 误导，出卖;vi. 证明...错误
sentence_en: He was offered money to betray his colleagues.
sentence_zh: 有人收买他出卖他的同事。
